channel.title: Remember first time you were scammed?
channel.description:
i was thinking of a way to make money in rsc so i went to karajama to do bannanas because i hear that was good money for people like me (noobs) well i had just made a large 3k and i thought i had most money in the world! so my "friend" said he would sell me a steel 2h for 3k so i said okay! well turns out it was like 500 gp max
i was devistated

item.title: Remember first time you were scammed?
item.dc:creator: @coolboy7 coolboy7
item.description:
@coolboy7 wrote:

I was scammed for my first santa by 3v1l 4rch3r…yes I still remember his name- he musta been a really good convincer…Claimed he was duping so I’m like…ok -give him addy pick- He gives 2 back, give him a few oddball items that NO ONE really carried around. Give him my santa which I had just bought for 200k…BAM he logs. 2 months later I come back to varrock where the rich people were always at and I was up to 1m or so(funny thing is that I gave 5 spinach rolls for a santa later that day ROFL no one had the warning on their pages that they werent worth anything back then :P) and I see him again…He had party hats, mask sets and santas out the ass- good scammer for avoiding fagex and getting the shit

Read full topic
item.source: Remember first time you were scammed?

item.title: Remember first time you were scammed?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Andrew:

There was a dude I once scammed…On rs in varrock he said buying accounts 70+ and I nicked 100k from him…

Thats not something you should be proud of…

Read full topic

item.title: Remember first time you were scammed?
item.dc:creator: @super super!!!
item.description:
@super wrote:

iv been scammed to many times to remember i lost 3 whips when they were 8m each to so cald “friends” lost 4k shark to a 2nd screen scam. nearly lost torags in lvl 1 wildy to a guy but my friends were on aciants and his team got smoked so i ended up getting the cash he was posting for my torags lol… i lost d legs and med to so called “freind” lost 16k shark and 2 santas from acidenly typing my password in ss… tho iv had some some luck when i saw a drop trade go wrong and endid up with d sq and green h.ween mask.

Read full topic
item.source: Remember first time you were scammed?

Surajd:

I always scam the scammer so it’s not a biggie

Lol me 2…

item.title: Remember first time you were scammed?
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:6, topic:3145”][quote author=VG_Kobra link=topic=3626.msg35865#msg35865 date=1148325869]

Someone conned RonTheCon once. He was so cool.

They showed 8000 magic logs, and RonTheCon put up 8,000,000 and then the guy changed it to 800 and poor RonTheCon didn’t notice. He was pissed, but it was only a small loss.

Right like who would ever notice a measly amount like 8 million…

I got scamme d by a guy one, He was selling me a power ammy for 10k, I put up 10k, then when I viewd it 10 mins later it said it was a gold Amulet, Looks very same so I was decieved by my vision
[/quote]
Right… like VG_Kobra can’t take a joke… Right… Right… Right… Right… Right… Right…[/quote]

Here is a Sarcasm Pot, It increases you Sarcasm Detection Level from 0 to 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Remember first time you were scammed?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I’ve never been scammed, but came close to it until someone told me that they cannot trim armour Omg I used to think everyone was an honest player back then.

But I also remember trying to scam people, then I found out about kaitnieks and within days I hated scammers

Oh, but my account was stolen before. Uploaded a script to my site and it had my username/pass in it. I was pissed and acted like it wasnt my fault

Read full topic

item.title: Remember first time you were scammed?
item.dc:creator: @Friday13th Friday13th
item.description:
@Friday13th wrote:

well its maybe hard to belive but I was scamed only once.
I gived a guy 80k, he said he will give them back next weak.

Anyway know not to give any money to people even if you have them on your friend list
